description.text:
Nature's Creations bietet eine Auswahl köstlicher , von der Natur
inspirierter Rezepte. Jedes Menü wurde sorgfältig und fachmännisch mit
ausgewählten, hochwertigen und natürlichen Zutaten hergestellt. Reich an
Rind, Lamm, Geflügel oder Fisch und garniert mit Gemüse, wie Spinat
Karotten, Tomaten oder Reis, lassen die erlesenen Rezepte Ihre
anspruchsvolle Katze jeden Bissen Geniessen.

categories.name: Nassfutter
categories.title: Nassfutter für Katzen jetzt bei der Migros

categories.name: Katze
categories.title: Qualitätszubehör für Ihre Katze in Ihrer Migros kaufen

categories.name: Tierwelt
categories.title: Tierwelt bei der Migros: nur das Beste für Ihren Liebling

product_details.regulated_description: Complete pet food for adult cats
product_details.product_description: GOURMET™ Nature's Creations is a collection of delectable recipes inspired by nature. These recipes are carefully made with high quality selected natural ingredients, expertly cooked and rich in beef, lamb, poultry or fish garnished with vegetables such as spinach, carrots or tomatoes and rice. Each exquisite recipe is crafted to make your discerning cat savour every bite with pleasure and delight. GOURMET™ Nature's Creations. Exquisite meals, inspired by nature.

distributor.name: Nestlé Suisse S.A.
distributor.address: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

general_information.label: Consumer storage instructions
values: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

declarations.feeding_instructions: Feeding guide: For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 3 to 4 cans per day in at least 2-3 separate meals.The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight.Serve at room temperature.

declarations.feed_analytical_constituents_statement: Analytical Constituents: Moisture: 79.5%, Protein: 12.5%, Fat Content: 2.8%, Crude Ash: 2.6%, Crude fibre: 0.05%.
declarations.feed_additives_statement: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 880; Vit D3: 134; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 10); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 0.25); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.8); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 1.9); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 18.2); taurine: 550. Flavourings.
